class.name: ocgd_IGESReader
class.brief_description: IGES file reader for OpenCASCADE shapes.
class.description:
Godot GDExtension wrapper for OpenCASCADE IGES import functionality. This class provides methods to import IGES (Initial Graphics Exchange Specification) files, a widely used CAD data exchange format. IGES files can contain 2D and 3D geometric data, including curves, surfaces, solids, and assembly information.
Features include reading IGES files (.igs, .iges formats), support for both visible and all entities import, transfer individual entities or complete models, progress reporting and error checking, shape validation and healing options, and statistics and diagnostic information.
The reader follows the standard OpenCASCADE workflow: load IGES file into memory, check file validity and report errors, transfer entities to OpenCASCADE shapes, and validate and fix resulting geometry.

method.name: clear_transfer_info
method.description: Clear transfer information and statistics.

method.name: get_check_fail_results
method.description: Get check fail results from the last operation.

method.name: get_file_info
method.description: Get information about the loaded IGES file including header data, units, and statistics.

method.name: get_last_error
method.description: Get the last error message from file operations.

method.name: get_nb_entities
method.description: Get the number of entities in the loaded IGES file.

method.name: get_nb_roots_for_transfer
method.description: Get the number of root entities available for transfer.

method.name: get_one_shape
method.description: Get the result as one shape (compound if multiple shapes).

method.name: get_progress
method.description: Get current transfer progress (0-100).

method.name: get_shape
method.description: Get a transferred shape by number (1-based index).

method.name: get_transfer_statistics
method.description: Get statistics about the transfer process.

method.name: load_file
method.description: Load an IGES file. Returns true if loading succeeded.

method.name: nb_shapes
method.description: Get the number of transferred shapes.

method.name: prepare_transfer
method.description: Prepare for transfer after loading file.

method.name: print_check_load
method.description: Print check load results. If fail_only is true, only shows failures.

method.name: print_check_transfer
method.description: Print check transfer results. If fail_only is true, only shows failures.

method.name: print_stats
method.description: Print statistics about loaded entities and transfer results.

method.name: set_read_visible_only
method.description: Set whether to read only visible entities (default: false, reads all).

method.name: transfer_entity
method.description: Transfer a specific entity by number. Returns true if transfer succeeded.

method.name: transfer_list
method.description: Transfer a list of entity numbers. Returns true if all transfers succeeded.

method.name: transfer_one_root
method.description: Transfer one root entity by number. Returns true if transfer succeeded.

method.name: transfer_roots
method.description: Transfer all root entities. Returns true if all transfers succeeded.

method.name: validate_file
method.description: Validate the loaded IGES file for consistency and errors.
